feed.title: BookLore Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.10.1
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • feat: allow specifying sender address in email provider settings (#315) by @astappiev

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Empty stars shown when one rating is missing (#321) by @adityachandelgit

🛠️ Refactoring

  • Add custom startup banner for spring boot app (#317) by @MaheshBabu11

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#323) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.10.2
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Add ability to have decimals in "Book Number" metadata field (#325) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Hotfix OPDS throwing 403 error (#331) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#332) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.10.3
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Ensure updated and deleted books reflect correctly in library view (#343) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#344) by @adityachandelgit

entry.title: New release for BookLore: Release v0.11.0
entry.content:
🌟 Changes in this release:

🚀 Features

  • Implement support for comic book files (CBZ, CBR and CB7) (#349) by @adityachandelgit
  • Display series name and number in table view (#366) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add support for series name in search bar (#365) by @adityachandelgit
  • Add sorting option: Title followed by Series (#362) by @adityachandelgit
  • Reduce memory footprint during comic cover parsing (#361) by @adityachandelgit

🐛 Bug Fixes

  • Refine handling of file create/delete events in library watcher (#348) by @adityachandelgit

📖 Documentation

  • Merge Develop into Master for Release (#367) by @adityachandelgit
